name: Dungeon Merchant
description:
Buy and sell weapons, armour, potions and more to grow your humble shop. Hire adventurers and equip them with items before sending them into the dungeon to collect gold and loot for you. You've got a debt to pay to the king and in order to pay it, you're going to have to buy low, sell high and hope your hired heroes make it out alive.



Dungeon Merchant is a hybrid, idle, dungeon crawler mixed with shop simulation game. In order to earn gold and improve your business, you must hire heroes to send into the dungeon and retrieve loot. As the dungeon changes so does the demand of certain items, armour and weapons. Use the changes in the dungeon to your advantage to buy low and sell high.



Don't get too greedy though! Lower levels of the dungeon provide better loot but more fierce monsters. If your hero dies in the dungeon, they're gone for good, along with all of the gear you equipped them with! Continue to grow your shop via upgrades and learn more about the world through character dialogue interactions.
